cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 9th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 9th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 6 Bed Mixed Dorm. Each bed comes with privacy curtains, personal power point, reading light and under-bed storage. Room comes with en-suite toilet and shower, TV, fridge, climate control, wifi and towels.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Book a private dorm for the two of you.  Each bed comes with privacy curtains, personal power point, reading light and under-bed storage. Room comes with en-suite toilet and shower, TV, fridge, climate control, wifi and towels.

privates.name: Deluxe 5 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Perfect for a family. Room includes 1xDouble Bed & 3 single beds with bathroom, fridge, heat pump and TV. No more than two adults allowed per room. Adult age is 17 years and over.
Please Note: 2 adults  3 children Max. 5 Adults possible with extra charge

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
